name: Kim Na Na
description:
Kim Na Na's to-do list includes fun activities in the park. Enjoy life's simple pleasures, take a break, and rediscover important life lessons. 

Use WASD and spacebar keys to move your character.

Game Overview

Title: Kim Na Na

Platform: PC Standalone

Genre: RPG, adventure

Target: Casual gamer (ages 6+)

Developer: Janean

Kim Na Na is a third-person mini-RPG adventure game where the player is a girl who’s out to explore the park. She has listed several things that she wants to do at the park, and all of these must be successfully completed. Inside the game is a collection of casual minigames meant to be light, fun, and stress-relieving. Some cannot be accomplished without enough coins, though. The player must find a way to earn enough coins to continue the journey. 

Assets

3D assets are downloaded from the Unity Asset Store.

2D assets are the developer’s original creations.
